pullrequest.title: fix inertia ratio reduction error with hardcoded ratio limit. check for violation of line criterion.  added test.

content.raw: yes, ae43c3b doubles the iterations because we are now reducing inertia less aggressively and not altering model dynamics incorrectly.  Previously for specific combinations of MOI's and constraint direction, the algorithm actually bumps up the diagonals artificially to keep diagonal dominance, whereas the new approach increases minimum MOI ratio.  Latter approach is the correct one as it does not alter dynamics.
content.html: yes, ae43c3b doubles the iterations because we are now reducing inertia less aggressively and not altering model dynamics incorrectly. Previously for specific combinations of MOI's and constraint direction, the algorithm actually bumps up the diagonals artificially to keep diagonal dominance, whereas the new approach increases minimum MOI ratio. Latter approach is the correct one as it does not alter dynamics.
